alert.note: Alert for Judith Basin County and Judith Gap (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 4:57PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Judith Basin County through 530 PM MDT... At 457 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Geyser, or 13 miles west of Stanford, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Judith Basin County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Judith Basin County and Judith Gap
